alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Elmore; Macon; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 6:29PM CDT until July 22 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elmore County in east central Alabama... Northwestern Bullock County in southeastern Alabama... Macon County in southeastern Alabama... South central Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Victoryland to Hardaway to near Franklin Field, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tuskegee, Tallassee, Notasulga, Milstead, Shorter, Franklin, Liverpool, Liberty City, Reeves Airport, Lake Tuskegee, Tallapoosa City, Hardaway, Tuskegee National Forest, Tysonville, Victoryland, Davisville, I 85 Rest Area, Uphapee Creek, Fort Davis and Cross Keys. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
